function.name: deviceTemperatureSetting_decrease
function.description: This function is used to lower the temperature of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to lower the temperature on.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment to lower the temperature on.

temperature.description: The amount by which to lower the temperature.
